name: AudioBrush \u2013 Music-adapting arcade game using your own music
blurb: A ground-breaking way to game on your mobile device, take your own tracks and play them in a touch friendly Guitar Hero-like fashion.

rewards.reward: The moment that AudioBrush is released we will let you know.
Credit Pledge - You will be given a voucher code to redeem in-game which will give you \u00a35+ worth of credits.
Unlimited Plays Pledge - You will be given a voucher code to redeem in-game which will allow you to play unlimited tracks and a few credits on the side, together worth \u00a35+.
Double Credits Pledge - You will be given a voucher code to redeem in-game and be credited on the official website in the special section.

Unlimited Plays with Credit - LIMITED EDITION voucher code for a special theme only available via the \u00a320+ pledge. Also you will get you a voucher allowing you unlimited track plays in the final game and a bunch of credits you can spend on extras. Once you get your copy of AudioBrush we will send your voucher codes which you can use to redeem your rewards. You will also be credited on the official website in a special section.

To show our gratitude for a \u00a350+ pledge we will provide you with an unlimited plays voucher code along with all the unlockables in the game and the limited edition theme (only available here on Kickstarter). You will be in the news on our social feeds and mentioned on the home page of the website. If you like you will also be added to the BETA testing group which will be available before launch AND you will have early access any new version of AudioBrush and subsequent products.

The massive \u00a3100+ pledge will earn you a place in the IN-GAME credits. Unlimited credits in-game, as well as all unlockables unlocked, inc Limited Edition Theme (via voucher codes). You will be on all of our social feeds where you will be personally thanked, as well as a unique mention on the official website for a period of time. You will also be allowed to join any BETA program to obtain AudioBrush versions earlier than anyone else.

The unbelievable \u00a3500+ or more pledge will earn you a place at the top of the IN-GAME credits and extra special \u00a3500+ limited edition theme (not the same as the \u00a320+ Limited Edition Theme). Unlimited credits in-game, as well as all unlockables unlocked (via voucher codes). You will be on all of our social feeds where you will be personally thanked, as well as a unique mention on the official website for a period of time. Any other offers that may come about nearer launch will also be available to you. You will also be allowed to join any BETA program to obtain AudioBrush versions earlier than anyone else.

You personally will be part of the AudioBrush team as basically a Associate Producer. You must be over 18 to grab this reward as you will need to sign various legal documents. You will be able to contact me directly via Skype or Hangouts, or even if you live close come round and join in with my pretty design pictures.
